title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-1.4 - Overtime hourly rate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-1.4 - Overtime hourly rate

State Regulations

An employer shall pay an employee, except a janitor in a
residential building, for overtime at a wage rate of 11/2 times the employee's
regular rate for hours worked in excess of 40 hours in a
workweek. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
141-1.4

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
